price: (62) Is that [i.e., Paradise] a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqūm?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
